text: Rise of the Planet of the Apes is a 2011 American science fiction movie. It stars James Franco, John Lithgow, Brian Cox, Tom Felton, and Andy Serkis. It was released on August 5, 2011. It got positive reviews. The film was followed by three sequels: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes (2014), War for the Planet of the Apes (2017), and Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes (2024). Roger Ebert gave the movie 3 out of 4 stars. He liked how Serkis played Caesar by saying it was a "wonderfully executed character" and "one never knows exactly where the human ends and the effects begin, but Serkis or Caesar gives the best performance in the movie." ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2011 science fiction movies Category:English-language movies Category:Planet of the Apes movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Reboot movies Category:Dystopian movies Category:Movies about apes Category:Movies about animal rights Category:Movies about animal cruelty Category:Movies about genetic engineering Category:Movies about rebellions Category:Movies about scientists Category:Movies about viral outbreaks Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies set in Africa Category:Movies set in forests Category:Movies set in the 21st century
title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
